DrPublish:link.name: article
DrPublish:link.description: Fetch article by id - this is actually the URI for the article and will be used for PUT/DELETE actions as well

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: Comma separated values list of fields to return for the requested resource(s)
parameter.allowedValues: List of valid resource property names

parameter.name: scope
parameter.description: If set to internal, will retrieve information from the saved cores (non-public resources)

parameter.name: apikey
parameter.description: API Key for accessing non-public resources. Only needed if "scope" is set to "internal"

parameter.name: callback
parameter.description: JSONP callback function

parameter.name: publication
parameter.description: The publication that the article belongs to
parameter.allowedValues: The name of a valid publication

parameter.name: author
parameter.description: The author of the article(s)
parameter.allowedValues: Username of the creator of the article. Cannot be used in conjunction with the authors property!

parameter.name: authors
parameter.description: A list of authors of the article(s)
parameter.allowedValues: Comma separated values list of author usernames. "," means OR, "+" means AND. Cannot be used in conjunction with author property!

parameter.name: tag
parameter.description: A tag of the article(s)
parameter.allowedValues: A tag of the article. Cannot be used in conjunction with the tags property!

parameter.name: tags
parameter.description: A list of tags
parameter.allowedValues: Comma separated values list of tags. "," means OR, "+" means AND. Cannot be used in conjunction with tag property!

parameter.name: dossier
parameter.description: A dossier of the article(s)
parameter.allowedValues: A dossier of the article. Cannot be used in conjunction with the dossiers property!

parameter.name: dossiers
parameter.description: A list of dossiers
parameter.allowedValues: Comma separated values list of dossiers. "," means OR, "+" means AND. Cannot be used in conjunction with dossier property!

parameter.name: category
parameter.description: A category of the article(s)
parameter.allowedValues: A category of the article. Cannot be used in conjunction with the categories property!

parameter.name: categories
parameter.description: A list of categories
parameter.allowedValues: Comma separated values list of categories. "," means OR, "+" means AND. Cannot be used in conjunction with category property!

parameter.name: dynamicQuery
parameter.description: This can contain extra parameters passed to the search, such as fields generated on the fly in DrPublish, etc.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.description: Used in pagination. "Page number"

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Used in pagination. "Number of items per page"
